description:
When performing a query to a nova api server (version Essex4, it does not happen on Essex2) asking for a specific server details using application/xml, the server returns an error 500.
The nova-api log show something like:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/8226/

It does not happen when using a json request.
title: nova api returns an error 500 while asking server details using application/xml
